duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze digital system RTL to determine power savings opportunities and implement corresponding changes to reduce power.
Develop flows for power analysis and savings to be used by teams.
Provide Technical Support and Guidance for power savings.
Organize and deliver training on power analysis and savings to groups and companywide.
Analyze and solve EM/IR issues on digital P&R implementations.

education_certification.credential: BS in Computer/Electrical Engineering, Computer Science, or related field with 4-5 years of experience
